movies.title: School 2017
movies.description: A drama about the struggles of high school students as they navigate friendships, dreams, and the pressures of education.

movies.title: Boys Over Flowers
movies.description: A high school girl navigates the world of the rich and popular at an elite school while dealing with her feelings for a rebellious young man.

movies.title: Love Alarm
movies.description: A young woman navigates love and relationships in a society where an app alerts people when someone nearby has romantic feelings for them.

movies.title: True Beauty
movies.description: A high school girl, who was bullied for her appearance, becomes a beauty after learning makeup, only to face new challenges in her relationships.

movies.title: Cheer Up!
movies.description: A high school cheerleading team faces challenges as they compete in a national championship, all while dealing with personal struggles.

movies.title: Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok-joo
movies.description: A young weightlifter in college deals with love, friendship, and personal growth while pursuing her athletic dreams.

movies.title: A River Runs Through It
movies.description: A story of love, growth, and challenges set against the backdrop of a river and the students' journey through school and life.

movies.title: First Love
movies.description: A beautiful love story about a shy high school girl and a popular boy who experience the ups and downs of first love.

thai_movies.title: Playful Kiss
thai_movies.description: A clumsy but determined high school girl becomes involved with the most popular and genius student at her school in a comedic love story.

thai_movies.title: SOTUS: The Series
thai_movies.description: A story about a freshman and a senior at a university who find themselves involved in a developing romance despite the seniorâ€™s strict mentoring ways.

thai_movies.title: Home school
thai_movies.description: A story about two college students, one straight and one gay, who are forced to live together as roommates and find themselves at odds, yet eventually developing feelings for each other.

thai_movies.title: The Gifted
thai_movies.description: A lighthearted romance about a college student who pretends to be in a relationship with a popular and attractive senior in order to ward off his persistent admirer.

thai_movies.title: who are you
thai_movies.description: A drama about two college boys from rival families who have been at odds since childhood but unexpectedly find themselves in a relationship despite their differences.

thai_movies.title: summer break
thai_movies.description: A shy college student gets involved with a popular senior after an accident brings them together, leading to a complicated but heartfelt romance.

cdrama.description: A heartwarming story of two high school students who find love and face challenges while growing up and learning about themselves.

cdrama.title: Go Ahead
cdrama.description: Three young people from broken families find solace in each other, navigating their way through adolescence and personal struggles.

cdrama.title: Skate Into Love
cdrama.description: A passionate romance between a talented figure skater and a college student who excels in ice hockey, bringing them closer despite their differences.

cdrama.description: A sweet romantic comedy about two high school students who discover their feelings for each other as they go through the ups and downs of teenage life.
